name: Last Stand (glimaleite)
description:
Ludum Dare 41 Compo Entry!

You only have one ship left. Use it to build a base and defeat the Alien Invasion. Last Stand is a combination of Bullet Hell with Real Time Strategy. Use WASD or arrows to move, shoot with left mouse button, gather resources with right mouse button when flying above them.

Kill aliens, grab their resources, melt them on the Factory, turn them into Metal, and build with it.
Build an armada, make your ship overpowered and slay the aliens!

Obs.: This game was made in under 48 hours by only one person - me.
Link to LD Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/last-stand
